name: Reubin_Fields
text:
Reubin Fields
Reubin Fields was a member of the Corps of Discovery.
On September 21, 1805, after meeting the Nez Perce Chief Twisted Hair, Fields was sent by William Clark to find Meriwether Lewis' company and bring them to the Nez Perce camp.
Behind the scenes
Reubin Field (c. 1771 – 1822) was a woodsman and hunter who was one of the first to be recruited for the Lewis and Clark Expedition, alongside his brother, Joseph.
